title: ID help please
content:
I need help IDing the font used for Business Ownership Initiative in the sample. I used Identifont, but since the dot on the lowercase i is very unusual, an inverted, tilted teardrop, it didn’t come up with it. Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015172127im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/logo1_5951.jpg)

 [‹ Another similar to the ITC Avant Garde Extra light.. but what is it?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015172127/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42823 "Go to previous forum topic") [Possible custom? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081015172127/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42820 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rldkridel
